users.name: Finn 'the Human' Mertens
users.bio: Adventurer and hero, last human, defender of good

users.name: Bonnibel Bubblegum
users.bio: Scientist, bearer of candy power, ruler of the candy kingdom

users.name: Jake the ranger.
users.bio: Previously employed by the WorldWide Tanker Organization, where Jake would spend his time wearing tankers. Now, he lives under a rock.

users.name: Ricky Rockerson
users.bio: Rick spends his time building rockets and testing them out in his pasture. One day, he will fly.

users.name: Freddy the fisherman
users.bio: Freddy, once a hardened criminal working from the outskirts of the Martian jungle, is now a fisherman who enjoys capturing fish in his net and eating them alive.

users.name: James the Pollo Loco
users.bio: Born on the smoldering back of the Ancient Dragon 'Malthael', James 'Draconis' Pollo Loco will grow to become the king of the First World.

users.name: Cassidy 'The Hammer' Wrothchild
users.bio: From a reletavely small town outside the larger cities of the Metropolis, 'The Hammer' got her nickname by lifting the decrepit Daedric tool from it's supposed resting place before the war of the Ancients.
